mapper.update: insert into tb_win_report(create_time,gen_date,add_people,total_score,user_count,add_score,minus_score,other_score,actual_win_score,win_score,tenant_id) select now() create_time,#{date} gen_date,ifnull(u.add_people,0),ifnull(u.total_score,0),ifnull(score.user_count,0),ifnull(o.add_score,0),ifnull(o.minus_score,0),ifnull(o.other_score,0),ifnull(o.actual_win_score,0),ifnull(score.win_score,0),dept.dept_id tenant_id from sys_dept dept left join (select dept_id,ifnull( count(case when create_time BETWEEN #{date} and DATE_ADD(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) then score end) ,0) add_people,ifnull(sum(score),0) total_score from sys_user where `status`='0' and user_type='01' group by dept_id) u on(u.dept_id =dept.dept_id ) left join (select tenant_id,ifnull(count(DISTINCT user_id),0) user_count,ifnull(sum(case when `status` = 2 then score end),0) - ifnull(sum(case when `status` = 1 then score end),0) win_score from tb_score_record where `status` in(1,2) and create_time BETWEEN #{date} and DATE_ADD(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by tenant_id) score on(score.tenant_id =dept.dept_id ) left join (select tenant_id,ifnull(sum(case when type in(1,3) then score end),0) add_score,ifnull(sum(case when type in(2,4) then score end),0) minus_score,ifnull(sum(case when type not in(1,2,3,4) then score end),0) other_score, ifnull(sum(case when type in(1,3) then score end),0) - ifnull(sum(case when type in(2,4) then score end),0) actual_win_score from tb_order_record where `status` = 1 and create_time BETWEEN #{date} and DATE_ADD(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by tenant_id) o on(o.tenant_id =dept.dept_id )
